thread.title: Two Police Officers Killed in Ohio While Responding to 911 Call

author: wsjcom
title: Two Police Officers Killed in Ohio While Responding to 911 Call
text:
WESTERVILLE, Ohio—Two Ohio police officers responding to a 911 hang-up call were fatally shot on Saturday after entering a townhome in a Columbus suburb, and a suspect was taken into custody, authorities said.
Westerville Police Chief Joe Morbitzer said Officer Eric Joering, 39 years old, died at the scene and his colleague, Tony Morelli, 54, died at a local hospital. Chief Morbitzer said the officers were responding to a “potential domestic situation.”
...
